alert.note: Alert for Goshen (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 09 at 10:15PM MDT until September 10 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GOSHEN AND NORTHEASTERN PLATTE COUNTIES... At 1014 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Two Moon Campground, or 23 miles north of Wheatland, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Guernsey Campground. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 85 and 94, and between mile markers 97 and 116. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
